# Binary Cross Entropy


$$-(ylog(p)+(1-y)log(1-p))$$
- $$L(y, \hat y) = - \Sigma_{i}y_{i}log(\hat y_{i})+ (1-y_{i})log(1-\hat y_{i})$$
